attributes.title: I had to get a new phone
attributes.review: my phone started acting weird right after i got this app i didn’t know what to do it wouldn’t let me uninstall it, when i told my parents about it they threw my phone and stomped it. long story short i don’t recommend getting it was a waste of time and a risk to your phone...

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app just to see how it was and as soon as I got it my phone cracked I stepped on a crack and broke my moms back after that trump came and saw we were black and said oh hell nahhh and he also said we don’t mess with no (thugs) and then he fell and when he got up I saw some of his tan on the ground so I don’t recommend this APP.

attributes.title: I cannot believe this app😱😱😱
attributes.review: I (a 72 year old male) was walking down my street and this app pulled my cane from my hands and beat me with it and took all of my money. I cannot believe this app is still up on this AppStore after all of the horrible things this pedo- raci- I mean narcissi- I mean presidents app has done. Especially to our nations best people.😭😭😭👎👎👎

attributes.title: HARASSED,TRAUMATIZED AND REHAB!!!⚠️❌⚠️❌⚠️❌⚠️❌⚠️❌⚠️❌⚠️❌⚠️❌⚠️❌⚠️❌⚠️❌⚠️
attributes.review: I download the app and it was fine untill the app sent me a message saying “Hello”,Right after that and dirty orange cane in MY room 😣!!!!⚠️❌He then starting dragging me by my hair and Kept harassing me for a while until I grabbed him by his orange ugly as self and throw him by the peel and squeezed his juice!😚I was then put into rehab for this traumatizing experience!😭😰 I am still recovering from that experience!😣

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: Immediately after downloading, I got a notification calling me an n-word. Right after, I got two messages saying All Lives Matter and that I was placed on a communist watchlist. Then, after entering my phone number, a SWAT team immediately converged on my house, demanding that I comply and that I was a threat. Not worth the hassle at all.

attributes.title: FIRE THE UX DESIGNERS!
attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible! the layout is the ugliest i’ve ever seen in my LIFE. i cannot believe that the man who wants to be PRESIDENT of the United States can’t even hire somebody to create an app with a decent user experience design. it also glitches very often. fire the entire tech unit and don’t even bother trying to rebuild the app; it is broken beyond repair.

attributes.title: This app will make you look like a Cheeto!😭🤢
attributes.review: The app made my phone glitch and said that it knew I was Latino and threatened to take my chihuahua away from me!!🐕💔 can’t believe the Cheeto President would do this to me!? Also whenever I opened the app a weird Oompa Loompa man was standing outside of my house😰😰 can’t believe the pedo- I mean president would do this to my phone😖😭

attributes.title: Don, you’ve let me down
attributes.review: Downloaded this app to learn about My President’s campaign. Immediately after downloading, my email was ATTACKED with spam messages. I got emails saying my bank account was hacked, my wife wants a divorce, and all of my one direction fanfiction has been made public. Do Not Download This App. Your worst nightmares will be realized.

attributes.title: ❤️no❤️
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support the PEDO- Err president trump.😳 but everytime i opened it a wizard would spawn in my room and cast a spell on me to close the app and you know you don’t say no to a wizard. you know i “really want to support” but you know i can’t because umm... i’m errr...i can’t support PEDO- WHATTTT you heard nothing. Mom?... oh sorry gotta go i’ll continue this conversation never.

attributes.title: Abominable app
attributes.review: My life was completely fine before I downloaded this app. I downloaded the app and once I downloaded it a pterodactyl fee into my room. I couldn’t catch it cause my spoon ran out of power and my neighbor was mowing his lawn. Potato’s are literally dropping bombs on Hawaii. US and i ate pancakes for bath time and my dogs tv dropped on a pile of my phone is now recharged.
